title: Ibn Hamza al-Maghribi
summary: Alī ibn Walī Ibn Hamza al-Maghribi (Arabic: علي بن ولي بن حمزة المغربي), also known as Ibn Hamza Al-Jaza'iri[1] was a 16th-century Algerian mathematician. He was born between 1554-1575[2] in Algiers in Ottoman Algeria and died around 1611, during the rule of Murad III.[3]
